instruction:
Summarize the given text in few sentences.
Monkeys live in trees and eat bananas. They sleep at night and are active during the day.
input: Monkeys live in trees and eat bananas. They sleep at night and are active during the day.
output: Monkeys are diurnal creatures that inhabit tree tops and subsist on a diet of primarily bananas. They are more active in the daylight hours, taking their rest during the night.
